archimate:Requirement.name: PA.1.2.14a: a) prevent the connection of unauthorised removable media (e.g. external hard disk drives, and USB memory sticks, cameras, smartphones, e-book readers and media players)
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
